data.title: It's a match!
data.text: This is where our story unfolds.

data.title: Insta-Connection
data.text: When I first asked for your instagram ID, and we started texting each other.

data.title: Audio Affection Ô∏èüìû
data.text: The day when you couldn't wait to hear my amazing voice so you asked to audio call me.

data.title: Screen to Heart
data.text: Next day, even the audio call wasn't enough. So we both decided to video call, and it felt amazing.

data.title: Love's Grand Entrance - Our First Meet
data.text: The day we first met will always be special to me. Still remember you slowly descending from stairs, looking beautiful as ever.

data.title: Love Declarations üíè
data.text: The day we first expressed our love for each other. Remember how drunk you were, and what you replied to me when I first told you I love you? "I love you too. Tara malai propose garnu parcha."

data.title: My Most Special Birthday
data.text: My first birthday that I spent with you.

data.title: Our First Kiss
data.text: One of the most happiest moment of my life was when I first kissed you.

data.title: Her Birthday
data.text: I was so happy to be able to spend time with you on your birthday. You looked as beautiful as ever.

data.title: Dancing Hearts
data.text: The joy I felt dancing together for the first time on the night of prom.

data.title: Evening Euphoria
data.text: The first time we spent a night together, and also when we first shared a drink. Oh the peace I felt to sleep with you in my arms.
